name: Intergalactic Space Junk
description:
Intergalactic Space Junk was created by Johan Sögaard (Youhan / Flimsy) as a part of OpenJam 2017. The game is set in a not so far future where earth-garbage for many years has left its mark on our planet. But now, an even greater threat is facing our homeworld... INTERGALACTIC JUNK! You need to control your rocket-powered space-trash-can and collect all that junk before it reaches the surface of our planet!

See more on Github: 

https://github.com/youhan89/LDOpenJam17
